about_the_game:
ReEarth is an exciting real-time strategy (RTS) indie game. Here, you will play as humanity's last hope. By continuously upgrading and building your base, dispatching various types of tanks and units, you will fend off the oncoming swarms and reclaim Earth amidst the endless tides of monsters. Prepare for the challenge, return to Earth, and save the future of humanity!

Gameplay

Rising from ruins, you need to establish your base quickly. Collect resources, build defenses, and develop new technologies to ensure the continuous development of your base. Each building is crucial, from resource collection to defense turrets, and barracks to research labs. Proper layout and upgrades will determine your survival. The game combines RTS gameplay with survivor survival elements, bringing you exhilarating excitement through real-time battles with numerous units. Defend against the swarming bugs and reap your victory!

Diverse Combat Units

The game offers a variety of tanks and combat units for you to command. Light tanks are fast and suitable for quick counterattacks; Gauss tanks have powerful firepower, being your main force against large swarms; support units can provide repair and buff effects. Understanding the characteristics of each unit and combining them effectively is key to victory.

Real-Time Strategic Battles

The swarm is relentless, and you need to make quick and precise decisions on the ever-changing battlefield. Collect resources, optimize your defenses, and deploy your troops. Experience the thrill of intense combat through the perfect combination of strategy and tactics.

Diverse Missions

The game features a rich variety of missions, each with unique objectives and challenges. From protecting critical facilities to eliminating specific targets, each mission will test your wisdom and courage. Completing missions not only earns you generous rewards but also unlocks more powerful technologies and units.

The Charm of Indie Games

ReEarth is created by a passionate and creative indie development team. We are committed to providing players with a unique gaming experience, meticulously designing every detail to bring you unprecedented strategic fun. Join us in the world of ReEarth and write your own legendary chapter!

Feedback Collection

We look forward to any suggestions or feedback regarding any issues you encounter in our game. Please use the following link to help us gather information on Discord, and we will contact you as soon as possible!
